trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制更新的記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A FormViewUpdatedEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: FormViewUpdatedEventArgs 物件會傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄數目以及可能會發生任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷更新作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to access the original key field values for the updated record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要存取原始索引鍵欄位值更新記錄，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The original non-key field values can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用存取原始的非索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updated values (which include updated key field values, if you allow the user to edit key fields) are accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 已更新的值 （其中包含更新的索引鍵欄位值，如果您允許使用者編輯索引鍵欄位） 用來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項會傳回所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性在更新作業之後。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When handling an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 處理更新作業期間發生的例外狀況，您可以保有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the FormViewUpdatedEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 FormViewUpdatedEventArgs 類別的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> object contained in the `e` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|值`affectedRows`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|中包含的<xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>物件`e`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|初始化為`false`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>|初始化為`false`。 | > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式時引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> </xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception raised when the update operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>表示在執行更新作業時引發的例外狀況。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If no exception is raised, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果不引發任何例外狀況時，使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>這個參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows property to determine the number of records affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AffectedRows 屬性來判斷更新作業所影響的記錄數目。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was updated in the following situations: - Verify that only a single record was updated.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於驗證正確的記錄數目已更新以下情況:-確認已更新一筆記錄。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an improperly written update statement can update multiple records.
trans-unit.target: 有時候撰寫不正確的 update 陳述式可以更新多筆記錄。

trans-unit.source: - Verify that a record was updated when an error occurs during the update operation that does not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: -確認不會引發例外狀況在更新作業期間發生錯誤時，已更新的資料錄。

trans-unit.source: - Verify that a record was updated when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency checking), such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls, has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: -確認記錄已更新資料來源控制項時，支援衝突偵測 （開放式並行存取檢查），例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制、 具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>屬性設定為`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be updated.
trans-unit.target: 此設定時，可能不會更新已被另一位使用者並行的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得例外狀況 （如果有的話） 進行更新作業時所引發。

trans-unit.source: Use the Exception property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況屬性來判斷例外狀況 （如果有的話） 進行更新作業時所引發。

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生任何例外狀況，則這個屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is thrown again by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果引發例外狀況，而且您決定要處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式，請務必設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`; 否則，請再次擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> object that represents the exception that was raised during the update operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>表示更新作業中引發的例外狀況物件。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在更新作業期間引發的例外狀況已處理的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the ExceptionHandled property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當更新作業期間引發例外狀況時，可用於 ExceptionHandled 屬性表示是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not thrown again by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，例外狀況就視為已處理，並且不會擲回再次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the exception is thrown again.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，再次擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項在更新作業之後，應保持在編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項會傳回所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性在更新作業之後。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the KeepInEditMode property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control should remain in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用 KeepInEditMode 屬性來指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項應該仍會處於編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式下，將此屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property should be used only when a situation occurs (such as an exception being raised) that requires the control to behave differently than it normally would.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 應該使用這個屬性，只有一種情況發生時 （例如引發例外狀況） 需要比平常有不同的行為的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control needs to remain in edit mode by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項需要維持在編輯模式中，依預設，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>後要保持處於編輯模式下更新作業。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the original key field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含更新的資料錄的原始索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: The Keys property contains the original values of the key fields listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵屬性包含的索引鍵欄位中所列的原始值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the Keys property to access the values of the key field for an updated record.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的索引鍵屬性來存取更新的記錄的索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property contains the original key field values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您允許使用者更新的索引鍵的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性包含原始索引鍵欄位值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The updated values are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 已更新的值會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵屬性會傳回<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>實作物件<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>介面。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the fields of the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的欄位名稱，請使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>屬性<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，您可以存取的欄位值使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，請您也可以使用的索引子<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件來存取該欄位值直接。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源的欄位順序所依賴的控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) 可以只依索引存取欄位的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of the original key field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含更新的資料錄原始索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含更新的資料錄的新欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the NewValues property to access the new field values for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用新值 屬性來存取新的欄位值更新記錄。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property contains the original key field values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您允許使用者更新的索引鍵的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性包含原始索引鍵欄位值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The updated values are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 已更新的值會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NewValues property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會傳回新值<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>實作物件<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>介面。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the fields of the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的欄位名稱，請使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>屬性<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，您可以存取的欄位值使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，請您也可以使用的索引子<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件來存取該欄位值直接。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源的欄位順序所依賴的控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) 可以只依索引存取欄位的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含更新的資料錄的新欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the original non-key field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含更新的資料錄的原始非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the OldValues property to access the original non-key field values for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 OldValues 屬性來存取原始的非索引鍵欄位值更新記錄。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。

trans-unit.source: A data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency checking), such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls, with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` also compares these original values against the record in the database before an update operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 支援衝突偵測 （開放式並行存取檢查），例如資料來源控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項，以其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>屬性設定為`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`執行更新作業之前，也會比較針對資料庫中記錄這些原始值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If a record has been modified by another user concurrently, the record is not updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果記錄已被另一位使用者同時，記錄將不會更新。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property does not contain key fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>屬性不包含索引鍵欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the original key field values are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您允許使用者更新的索引鍵欄位的值時，原始的索引鍵欄位值會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The updated values are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 已更新的值會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>實作物件<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>介面。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the fields of the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的欄位名稱，請使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>屬性<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，您可以存取的欄位值使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，請您也可以使用的索引子<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>物件來存取該欄位值直接。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源的欄位順序所依賴的控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) 可以只依索引存取欄位的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含更新的資料錄原始欄位名稱/值組的字典。
